EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-10-16 eBlast 1 to Customers re: 6.2.ES-2018-10-16 eBlast 1 to Customers
EmailTemplate.subject: Have you had a chance to take a closer look?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I wanted to reach out to you directly with a reminder to check out our latest product release <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-6-2]]>!
We have an array of exciting new features that mark a strong step forward in our roadmap towards bringing modern workload automation to the full-stack across hybrid environments. Check out our 6.2 Highlight Reel below to learn more.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-6-2/turbonomic-6-2-highlight-reel]]>
In addition to the above video, we haveÂ plenty of other resources including customer success stories, usage guides and more. Check out our Resource Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-6-2]]> or reach out to your account rep to learn more!
Best, Elizabeth
